document.full_text: american international group inc sued two money management firms on thursday in the start of a fight to recoup billions of dollars the bailed-out insurer said it lost due to fraud.
document.title: aig seeks to recoup billions it says lost to fraud
lines_and_colors: american international group inc sued two money management firms on thursday in the start of a fight to recoup billions of dollars the bailed-out insurer said it lost due to fraud.
